director.name: 亚历山大·科贝里泽 Aleksandre Koberidze

this_title: The More I Zoom in on the Image of These Dogs, The Clearer it Becomes They Are That They Are Related to the Stars
trans_title: 我越放大这些狗狗的照片，就越明确它们属于星星
chinese_title: 我越放大这些狗狗的照片，就越明确它们属于星星
foreign_title: The More I Zoom in on the Image of These Dogs, The Clearer it Becomes They Are That They Are Related to the Stars
